title: Ala Moana Center
seo_description: Visitors and locals flock to this indoor/outdoor shopping mall, home to over 290 shops and restaurants.
contents_1: Visitors and locals flock to this indoor/outdoor shopping mall, home to over 290 shops and restaurants.
description: Visitors and locals flock to this indoor/outdoor shopping mall, home to over 290 shops and restaurants. Ala Moana Center is open every day, is close to Waikiki, and the convenient shuttle will take you right there. Within walking distance are popular stores including Wal-Mart, Sam’s Club, and Ross.
